reviewText: There have been many British detectives and now we have the many Swedish detectives. Both types show their own cultural idiosyncrasies. The edgier Swedish/Norwegian detectives are good but after watching Wallendar, killing, and Huss, Beck,for example ;although entertaining, they are no longer unique.

Story 5 was the last of the Den som drber mysteries which featured in the 2011 TV series on Denmark's TV2. A further feature film was made for cinematic release in March 2012, but TV2 decided not to renew the series claiming the ratings were not good enough. Overseas sales had been good for the series, but that was not enough. Here we are then with Katrine (Laura Bach) and Thomas (Jakob Cedergren) seemingly happier in their love lives. Katrine meets a guy who sweeps her off her feet and shy Thomas is spending more time with his ex-wife Benedicte (Iben Dorner). An au pair from eastern Europe is discovered murdered in a particularly brutal fashion and Katrine, Thomas and Bisgaard (Lars Mikkelsen) are hot on the trail of the killer. Two familiar faces from The Killing - Complete Season 1 - 5-DVD Box Set ( Forbrydelsen (Forbrytelsen) ) ( The Killing - Complete Season One ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 2 Import - United Kingdom ] pop up briefly in this story, Marie Askehave and Peder Holm Johansen (who played Rie Skovgaard and Leon Frevert in the 2007 DR hit) alongside Henning Valin (Policeman Jesper Andersson - The Bridge Series 1 / The Candidate (Kandidaten) [Region 2]. Story 5 is just as good as the others, it's just unfortunate that no more series will be made.
